attributes.action: Open worship places to limited numbers(10 people)maintaining social distancing
attributes.additional_details:
Worship and prayers are essential in many religious people lives, and absence from these practices for long periods might negatively affect their spiritual and psychological wellbeing. Thus destroying their homes, ability to work and productivity.
Opening worship places while maintaining the rules reliefs the psychological stress for millions of religious people 
Most of religious people as well think that prayers can help in these difficult times and might shorten or eliminate this pandemic
attributes.background:
Allow prayers to be conducted in different worship places with limited number of people in each service while abiding to the social distancing rules
Local authorities can follow up the rules and apply penalties for those not abiding to them
